ISSUE.TITLE: Generate all possible combinations - stock quantity default value should be zero
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When using "Track inventory by product attributes" and click on "Generate all possible combinations" in "Attribute combinations", the grid populates items but the stock quantity default value is set to 10000. This is annoying since we need to go and remove it individually. The default value of "Stock quantity" should be zero.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Cache static content by default for 24 hours (cacheControlMaxAge)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1677 Stock quantity default value set to zero
#1677 Stock quantity default value set to zero
